name: Ambivo CRM Assistant
description: Access and query Ambivo CRM data using natural language. Query leads, contacts, deals, and other CRM entities.

authentication.instructions: Get your JWT token from Ambivo and paste it here. The token should start with 'eyJ'.

setup: 1. Start the GPT Actions server: python -m ambivo_gpt_actions serve
2. Copy the OpenAPI schema URL: http://localhost:8080/openapi.yaml
3. In ChatGPT, create a new GPT and add this as an Action
4. Configure authentication with your Ambivo JWT token
usage: Ask natural language questions about your CRM data:

example_queries: Show me all leads created in the last 7 days
Find contacts from companies in California
What deals have a value over $10,000?
List recent activities for lead ID 12345
Get contact details for email john@example.com
